manifest.name: Link Embed
manifest.description: Instantly turn plain links in your notes into beautiful, Notion-style rich link previews. The plugin automatically fetches page metadata (title, description, favicon & image) and renders it as an elegant, card-styled embed—so your vault stays informative and visually appealing with zero extra effort.
manifest.author: SErAphLi

data.manifestValue: Instantly turn plain links in your notes into beautiful, Notion-style rich link previews. The plugin automatically fetches page metadata (title, description, favicon & image) and renders it as an elegant, card-styled embed—so your vault stays informative and visually appealing with zero extra effort.
data.communityListValue: Convert URLs in your notes into embeded previews.
